_sText:
The map has 11 traps with different enviroments. Some are easy, some are pretty hard. I made the bhop part to teleport players back to start because using a trigger_hurt would be kinda hard for players. The explosion in the background city is just a random thought.

Music can be turned off from CSS settings.

Please report any bugs or so to me in comments.

Version 1.1
==================
- Removed the displacement hole at spawn and replaced it with a brush hole. This was done because some players got stuck in the hole for some reason.


- Black room with lights has a sprite trail which will guide you through the correct route.

- Made some platforms at the first climb wider and longer, so it will be a bit easier to climb.

- Now many people can finish the map with points and correct ending. The hole will be different every time, so nobody can "leech" their way to victory.

Version 1.2
==================

- Fixed: the correct way in the final trap didn't change.

- Added a wall to prevent two or more people from going in to press the final button

- Added a new bhop trap in a rocky pit
